author: Kiley W.
description: A cog for displaying system statistics, including CPU usage, RAM utilization, disk I/O, uptime, and ping to Discord.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the System Stats cog. This cog provides a quick overview of system performance and resource usage, including ping to Discord.
short: Displays system statistics including CPU, RAM, disk I/O, uptime, and ping to Discord.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data. It only provides real-time system statistics.
